t: Dina Kowal Creative: Making Paper Beads - resource list
s: Junk mail and catalogs can make great bead papers! Look for pages that have a top-to-bottom print, a gradient, or a wide border at the top and/or bottom. These were made from a college brochure. For the gel printed beads, I use a clay coated cardstock. It is 210gsm, so a little less than 80# cover weight. These ones are generally my favorite, just because of the handpainted look and custom colors. If you're going to paint your beads with craft ...
